Added_Other.name: DFFlagEnableLinkSharing
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows users to share links directly within the platform.
Added_Other.purpose: Enables players to easily share game links with friends.

Added_Graphics.name: FFlagRenderModelClusterEntityCulling
Added_Graphics.mechanism: Optimizes rendering by only processing visible parts of clustered models.
Added_Graphics.purpose: Enhances game performance and reduces lag by not rendering unseen objects.

Changed_Other.name: DFStringFlagRepoGitHashDynamicString
Changed_Other.mechanism: Updates the system to use dynamic strings for version control.
Changed_Other.purpose: Improves the reliability of updates and features for players.
